utils

Class TTEBufferedReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • utils.TTEBufferedReader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class TTEBufferedReader
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Doing the real work for the DiskReader, reads data from file, parses it into TTE items and caches them, until DiskReader will take them. Data item will be provided over a SynchronousQueue.
    See Also:
    DiskReader

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TTEBufferedReader(java.lang.String fp)
      The constructor initializes variables, the buffer and the input file.

    • Constructor Detail

      • TTEBufferedReader

        public TTEBufferedReader(java.lang.String fp)
        The constructor initializes variables, the buffer and the input file.
        Parameters:
        fp - filepath of the log file

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()
        Runs a loop for reading data from file. Will also do the slow skipping. Makes a lot of condition checks (pausing, slow seeking, end of file, stopping thread, ...).
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable

      • stopThread

        public void stopThread()
        Will be called by VeniceHub.java to end this Thread.

      • isFinished

        public boolean isFinished()
        With this method VeniceHub can check if this thread has finished, after a call of stopThread.
        Returns:
        true if this thread is ready to be terminated, else false.

      • seek

        public void seek(long timestampToSeek)
        Induces the seek for a specific timestamp in the file.
        Parameters:
        timestampToSeek - the timestamp to seek

      • getThresholdTimestamp

        public long getThresholdTimestamp()
        Gets the timestamp from the TTE that is on the threshold in buffer (if the capacity of the buffer is for example 1000 and the threshold is 100, than it gets the timetamp of the 900th item)
        Returns:
        the timestamp from the TTE that is on the threshold in buffer

      • estimateAvgBytesPerS

        public void estimateAvgBytesPerS()
        Estimates the average Bytes per Second by counting bytes for each timestamp and divide them by the difference of the timestamps. Will read a number of lines defined in Configuration.

      • getSyncQ

        public java.util.concurrent.SynchronousQueue<venice.lib.parser.SlotEvent> getSyncQ()
        Give access to the SynchronousQueue to receive data from the TTEBufferedReader. This is used by DiskReader.
        Returns:
        Reference to the SynchronousQueue used by TTEBufferedReader to send data.
